items.sentence: I minimized the document and then maximized it again.
Tom decided to stop drinking and reform his behavior.
I want you to say you're not going back to Australia.
I wanted to stay in Australia a couple of extra days.
Tom asked me if I wanted to go to Australia with him.
We hope that Tom sticks around for a couple of weeks.
I hope that Tom didn't tell anyone about what we did.
Do you know anybody who can teach my children French?
I wish that I could speak French as well as Tom does.
If you aren't there by 2:30, we'll leave without you.
